mapper.select: SELECT coupon_code as couponCode, user_id as userId, coupon_nm as couponNm, usable, use_dt as useDt, discount, reg_dt as regDt FROM user_coupon WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND to_char(reg_dt) = to_char(sysdate)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_coupon ( coupon_code, user_id, coupon_nm, usable, use_dt, discount, reg_dt ) VALUES ( ( SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('A', 15) FROM DUAL ), #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '영화 3천원 할인쿠폰', NVL(#{usable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0), ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 1), 3000, SYSDATE )
